x_938076_now_utils_now_utils_fix_scripts.description: This will correct some of the names and links in Instance Security Center's Madrid release. Do not re-run as this will have already run once during your upgrade to Madrid. - ISC Banner links will now point to the most updated version of the Kb and docs - Blacklist and Whitelist will now be shown as Untrsuted and Trusted in Table Label and Choice Label
x_938076_now_utils_now_utils_fix_scripts.name: Madrid: Correct Names and Links in ISC
